name: Verify whether user is able to select an option from the task to perform dropdown

steps.name: Given I open a browser and open RBAC Login page
When I click on sign in RBAC link
Then I enter the username and password to RBAC as tlsapp
Given Click on Create a rule
When User clicks on task to perform dropdown and click on pause
Then Check whether when selected pause only pause is visible

fullName: UI test cases: Verify whether user is able to select an option from the task to perform dropdown
